UPDATE cms_bt_jm_promotion_product AS a JOIN (SELECT cms_bt_jm_promotion_product_id,AVG(market_price) AS market_price,AVG(deal_price) AS deal_price,AVG(`discount`) AS discount ,max(market_price) AS max_market_price,max(deal_price) AS max_deal_price,min(market_price) AS min_market_price,min(deal_price) AS min_deal_price, MAX(`msrp_usd`) AS `max_msrp_usd`,MAX(`msrp_rmb`) AS `max_msrp_rmb` ,MAX(`retail_price`) AS `max_retail_price` ,MAX(`sale_price`) AS `max_sale_price`, MIN(`msrp_usd`) AS `min_msrp_usd`,MIN(`msrp_rmb`) AS `min_msrp_rmb` ,MIN(`retail_price`) AS `min_retail_price` ,MIN(`sale_price`) AS min_sale_price FROM `cms_bt_jm_promotion_sku` WHERE cms_bt_jm_promotion_product_id=#{cmsBtJmPromotionProductId}) AS b ON a.id=b.cms_bt_jm_promotion_product_id SET a.deal_Price=b.deal_price,a.market_price=b.market_price,a.discount=b.discount ,a.max_deal_Price=b.max_deal_price,a.max_market_price=b.max_market_price ,a.min_deal_Price=b.min_deal_price,a.min_market_price=b.min_market_price, a.max_msrp_usd=b.max_msrp_usd,a.max_msrp_rmb=b.max_msrp_rmb,a.max_retail_price=b.max_retail_price,a.max_sale_price=b.max_sale_price, a.min_msrp_usd=b.min_msrp_usd,a.min_msrp_rmb=b.min_msrp_rmb,a.min_retail_price=b.min_retail_price,a.min_sale_price=b.min_sale_price WHERE a.id =#{cmsBtJmPromotionProductId}
